ActionBarListener - Interface in com.philips.platform.uappframework.listener
Micro app framework defines the below interface which needs to be implemented by base app to inject as a parameter of launcher API.
ActivityLauncher - Class in com.philips.platform.uappframework.launcher
The purpose of the class if to launch micro-app as activity
